channel.title: Help how to portforward a NetGear 2000v3 Router
channel.description:
I am trying to make a web-client for my private server but I think there a problem with the port-forwarding. Any ideas on how to port-forward my server? Please Help!
Thanks

item.title: Help how to portforward a NetGear 2000v3 Router
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

You don’t need to port forward unless it’s a home hosted router, in which case you can follow the numerous guides in the Tutorial section.

Read full topic
item.source: Help how to portforward a NetGear 2000v3 Router
